pullRequest.body:
Add `tendsto_of_integral_tendsto_of_monotone`, as well as `...of_antitone` and the corresponding results for `lintegral`.

Also:
- move some results about measurability of limits of (E)NNReal valued functions from BorelSpace.Metrizable to BorelSpace.Basic to make them available in Integral.Lebesgue.
- add `lintegral_iInf'`, a version of `lintegral_iInf` for a.e.-measurable functions. We already have the corresponding `lintegral_iSup'`.

---
<!-- The text above the `---` will become the commit message when your
PR is merged. Please leave a blank newline before the `---`, otherwise
GitHub will format the text above it as a title.

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:
- [ ] depends on: #abc [optional extra text]
- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]
-->

bors d+
Nice!

I'm happy with your code. Can you check if you are happy with my addition, and then send it to bors or change whatever you like?
bors d+
Could you deprecate the old names, instead of erasing them completely?
I don't know how to do that. Do you have a link to an example?
Never mind. I found one.

```suggestion
    (hp : ∀ᵐ x ∂μ, p x fun n ↦ f n x) : ⨅ n, aeSeq hf p n =ᵐ[μ] ⨅ n, f n :=
  iSup (β := βᵒᵈ) hf hp
```

```suggestion
  suffices ∫⁻ a, F' a ∂μ = ∫⁻ a, F a ∂μ from
    ae_eq_of_ae_le_of_lintegral_le hF'_le (this ▸ h_int_finite) hF_meas this.symm.le
```
`suffices ... from` makes it possible to give a term mode proof instead of a tactic mode proof.
Could you give a docstring for this lemma and for the similar lemmas in this PR? The assumptions are long enough that I feel they deserve it.
It's not really important, but I expect that this theorem should be true without `hf_meas`.
If you don't mind, I'd rather get it in as it is and perhaps come back to improve that later.
I have pushed the removal of `hf_meas`.

```suggestion
-- 2024-03-08
@[deprecated] alias _root_.measurable_of_tendsto_ennreal' := ENNReal.measurable_of_tendsto'
```
Can you add similar deprecation dates to the other statements? In this way we know when we can remove them.
